no_wallet: No wallet? No worries, let me show you how to set up your own wallet and adopt your first Trekki!
guide_text_1: Install the Metamask extension through the official Metamask website or the Google Chrome store
guide_text_2: Create a new wallet and purchase ETH.
guide_subtext_2: Remember your wallet password and secret recovery phrase. You can directly purchase ETH through the built-in wallet function.
guide_text_3: Connect your wallet and purchase NFTs through Trekki website
guide_subtext_3: Go to Trekki website and click Connect Wallet.
guide_text_3_child_1: If you want to purchase a Trekki with a discount price, you can click the Join Adoption List button to finish tasks for a spot on the adoption list.
guide_text_3_child_2: If you wanna buy directly, you can wait for the public sale open, and buy Trekki from the public sale on the Trekki website.
guide_text_4: You can go to your Metamask wallet or Opensea to view your purchased NFTs
new_user_guide: No wallet? Let me teach you how to create one!
story_guide: In the distant west lay Trekia, an undiscovered realm home to the Trekki. The Trekki lived to wander and explore, fueled by discovering lands unknown.For eons they roamed Trekia, uncovering each secret until their world was depleted of wonders. As the Trekki were creatures nourished by wonder - they fed on discovery as others feed on food and drink, without new frontiers to uncover, their life force have faded into entropy.As hope dwindled, salvation found them in Tripo. Tripo was a rover at heart, haunted by wanderlust even trekking his world's end could not defeat. One day, Tripo stumbled upon an unseen portal and glimpsed a surreal world behind its veil. Here lay salvation for his fading race: a land bursting with mysteries to rouse their dulled souls.
